import React from 'react' import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, List, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap'; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0? null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
) } export default Booking
